text: Drasteria sesquistria is a moth of the family Erebidae. It is found in Russia, Kazakhstan, Afghanistan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan and Mongolia.Naturkundliches Informationssystem The wingspan is about 28 mm. Adults are on wing from April to July.Noctuidae.de ==References== Category:Drasteria Category:Moths described in 1854 Category:Moths of Asia
title: Drasteria sesquistria
